description: The spell lasts as long as you concentrate on it. Concentrating to maintain a spell is a standard action that does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Anything that could break your concentration when casting a spell can also break your con- centration while you’re maintaining one, causing the spell to end. You can’t cast a spell while concentrating on another one. Some- times a spell lasts for a short time after you cease concentrating. For example, the spell hypnotic pattern has a duration of concentration + 2 rounds. In such a case, the spell keeps going for the given length of time after you stop concentrating, but no longer. Otherwise, you must concentrate to maintain the spell, but you can’t maintain it for more than a stated duration in any event.
